announcementForms.title: Scholarship Opportunity
paragraphs: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, we will be hosting a weekly contest. The top five winners from each contest will earn the chance to join the U-CAN Academy E-Learning Platform for free.
This is your chance to enhance your learning experience and gain access to a wealth of resources, all while showcasing your knowledge and skills.
Mark your calendars and get ready to participate! Good luck!

steps.title: Visit the Home Page
steps.description: Navigate to the main page of our website.

steps.title: Click on the Weekly Contest Card
steps.description: Locate the card labeled 'Weekly Contest' on the home page. It should be prominently displayed with details about the contest.

steps.title: Follow the Instructions
steps.description: Once you click the card, you will be directed to the contest page with all the necessary instructions to participate.

announcementForms.title: Another Announcement
paragraphs: Here's another exciting opportunity for you this month.
Make sure to join us for the upcoming events!
